trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs class is used to supply event values to the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event and to enable you to specify a custom Windows identity for the current request.
trans-unit.target: A classe de DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs é utilizada para fornecer valores de eventos para o **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** eventos e que lhe permite especificar uma identidade personalizada do Windows para o pedido atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule> constructs a DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs object using the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule>constrói um objeto de DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs utilizando atual <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>e passa-o para o **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** eventos.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule> object constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs> object using the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule>construções de objeto um <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs>objeto utilizando atual <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>e passa-o para o **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** eventos.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs.Context%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs> object supplied to the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs.Context%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs>objeto fornecida para o **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** eventos para definir o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>propriedade atual <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>para personalizadas <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>objeto.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs.Context%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> referenced by the <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs.Context%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule> sets the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal> object that contains no user information.
trans-unit.target: Se não especificar um valor para o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>referenciado pelo <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs.Context%2A>propriedade, o <xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule>define o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>para um <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal>objeto que não contêm nenhuma informação de utilizador.</xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs.Context%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is raised after the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event and before the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthorizeRequest> event.
trans-unit.target: O **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento é desencadeado depois do <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>eventos e antes do <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthorizeRequest>eventos.</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthorizeRequest> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>

trans-unit.source: If you have an section that depends on the user name to deny or allow access to your application, modifying the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> can affect the behavior of your application.
trans-unit.target: Se tiver uma secção que depende o nome de utilizador para negar ou permite o acesso à sua aplicação, modificar o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>propriedade atual <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>pode afetar o comportamento da sua aplicação.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: Be sure that the user name you set during the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is considered when you specify the section in your configuration.
trans-unit.target: Ser Certifique-se que o nome de utilizador que definiu durante a **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento é considerado quando especificar a secção na configuração.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> objeto para o atual pedido HTTP.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> provides access to <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> objects for the current request.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>fornece acesso às <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>objetos para o pedido atual.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> objeto para o atual pedido HTTP.
